titles.title: Soledad Canyon Consistency Act
Soledad Canyon Consistency Act
To withdraw certain lands in Los Angeles County, California, from entry, appropriation, or disposal under the public land laws, and for other purposes.
Soledad Canyon Consistency Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary:
Soledad Canyon Consistency Act
This bill withdraws 640.16 acres of the Soledad Canyon Sand & Gravel Mining Project Site (California) from:
entry, appropriation, or disposal under the public land laws; location, entry, and patent under the mining laws; and operation of the mineral leasing, mineral materials, and geothermal leasing laws.
